font_size.$description: Font size that scales with typography multiplier

line_height.$description: Line height that scales with typography multiplier

letter_spacing.$description: Letter spacing for button text labels

font_family.$description: Font family for button text labels - consistent across all sizes

font_weight.$description: Font weight for button text labels - consistent across all sizes

text_decoration.$description: No text decoration for button labels

text_transform.$description: No text transformation for button labels

text_align.$description: Center alignment for button text labels. Note: Not supported by Figma variables - set manually in Figma components.

text_vertical_trim.$description: Vertical trim from cap height to baseline for optimal button text alignment. FIGMA LIMITATION: This token is not exported to Figma variables as Figma doesn't support text vertical trim variables. Set manually in Figma components using 'Vertical trim' property. CSS implementation: use 'text-box-trim: cap alphabetic' or equivalent.
